branchCategory.name: CLQ
branchCategory.description: <P>Compact cylinder series CLQ offers drop prevention when the pressure of air source is decreased or the residual pressure is released. The CLQ has a low profile design, with a compact lock unit.  Available in 8 bore sizes ranging from 20 to 100mm, and is auto switch capable. </P>

branchItem.name: C(D)LQ, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, With Lock
branchItem.description: <P>Compact cylinder series CLQ offers drop prevention when the pressure of air source is decreased or the residual pressure is released. The CLQ has a low profile design, with a compact lock unit.  Available in 8 bore sizes ranging from 20 to 100mm, and is auto switch capable. </P>

branchItem.name: CLQ, Accessory, Mounting Brackets
branchItem.description: <p>Compact cylinder series CLQ add on mounting brackets.</p>

branchItem.name: CLQ, Accessory, Knuckle Joints
branchItem.description: <p>Compact cylinder series CLQ add on rod end knuckle joints.</p>

branchItem.name: CLQ, Accessory, Joint and A,B Type Mounting Bracket
branchItem.description: <p>Compact cylinder series CLQ add on rod end simple joint and mounting brackets. </p>
